articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai"
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, enjoyed the completed opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai". 
					 The opera is adapted from a famous Chinese folk legend dealing with the story about the tragic love between Zhu Yingtai, the only daughter of an influential family, and Liang Shanbo, a son of an ordinary literary man's family, which has been handed down for more than 1600 years since about the fourth century A.D. 
					
					 The peculiar performance was acclaimed by the audience as it fully met the need of the original work and ensured a high level of artistry. 
					
					 At the end of the performance Kim Jong Il warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience, congratulating the artistes on their successful performance. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the success made by the creators and artistes in their creative work and extended thanks to them, expressing satisfaction over the fact that they created another splendid opera in a matter of less than one year by displaying wisdom and enthusiasm.
					
					 The opera is a great masterpiece as all its elements ranging from songs to stage decor and costumes reached a high artistic level, he said, adding that this laudable success made by the Phibada Opera Troupe is the brilliant fruition of the extraordinary mental power of the Korean revolutionary artistes and the original creative method of Korean style.
					
					 Noting that new artistes and students of the conservatoire satisfactorily performed their roles in the opera with high artistry, he stressed that the future of the Juche-oriented art is immensely bright and rosy as the country has a lot of such reliable reserve artistes.
					
					 It is very gratifying that the Phibada Opera Troupe completed another piece of opera with the sincere help of Chinese comrades at a time when the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front is being observed, he said, emphasizing that it is the invariable will of the WPK and the people to further consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Noting that cultural exchange plays an important role in deepening the understanding and developing friendly and cooperative relations among countries, he expressed expectation and belief that the art organizations including the Phibada Opera Troupe would create and perform more works conducive to defending the peace and security of the world and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					ã€€Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and officials in the fields of literature and arts and media.

articles.title: Protocol Inked between DPRK and China
articles.content:
Protocol Inked between DPRK and China
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the revision and supplementation of the agreement on cooperation in the patent field was inked here Monday by the DPRK Invention Office and the State Intellectual Property Office of the People's Republic of China.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were officials of the office headed by its Deputy Director O Pak and from the Chinese side members of the Chinese delegation led by Deputy Commissioner Li Yuguang.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Brief on Red Cross Activities
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Brief on Red Cross Activities
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Monday to brief on Red Cross activities on the occasion of the anniversary of the DPRK Red Cross Society. 
					 Present there on invitation were members of a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and a delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK, diplomatic envoys and staff members of embassies of different countries and members of international organizations here.
					
					 Present there were Ri Pong Hun, minister of Public Health, officials of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society and other officials concerned. 
					
					 The general secretary of the C. C., the DPRK Red Cross Society made a speech which was followed by congratulatory speeches by the head of the ICRC delegation and the head of the IFRCS delegation. There was a briefing about the activities of the DPRK Red Cross Society.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Swedish Ambassador
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Monday met and had a conversation with Barbro Elm, Swedish ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, when the ambassador paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: 6th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
6th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Opens
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The 6th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair was opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Monday. 
					 Displayed there are machine tools, electric and electronic equipment, vehicles, medicines, daily necessities, foodstuff, etc produced by companies of the DPRK, China, Germany, Russia, Malaysia, Mongolia, Syria, Switzerland, Singapore, Australia, Austria, Italy, Indonesia, India, Cuba, Poland and Taipei of China. 
					
					 Present there were Ri Thae Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, and others, delegations and delegates of different countries and regions, diplomatic envoys and staff members of embassies of various countries here. 
					
					 O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, made a congratulatory speech to be followed by an opening address made by Kim Mun Jong, director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation.
					
					 Speakers said that it is the consistent policy of the DPRK to develop economic and trade relations with all the countries friendly to the DPRK on the principle of equality and mutual benefits. 
					
					 Saying that the trade fair is playing a big role in improving the economic trade and conditions for the exchange of advanced science and technology and ensuring close economic cooperation among countries, they stressed that the DPRK would more extensively develop the relations of economic cooperation with other countries. 
					
					 A reception was given at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on the same day in connection with the opening of the fair.
					
					 The trade fair will last till Oct. 21.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Ri Po Ik
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the grave of Ri Po Ik, ardent patriot, in Mangyongdae on Monday on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of her demise.
					 Seen standing before the grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Ju Sang Song, Hong Sok Hyong and Ri Thae Nam and officials of party, armed forces and power organs and ministries and national institutions and officials and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Wreaths were placed before the grave in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, ministries and national institutions and the revolutionary school, party and power organs, farms, etc. here.
					
					 The participants in the ceremony observed a moment's silence in memory of Ri who encouraged her family members in the struggle to liberate the country in the period of national sufferings and devoted her all to the sacred cause for the country and its people.

articles.title: Newly Built State Theatre Unveiled
articles.content:
Newly Built State Theatre Unveiled
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The State Theatre was newly built.
					 More than 620-seater theatre has all facilities necessary for art creation, performing activities and audience ranging from stage, latest sound and lighting facilities, rehearsal rooms and make-up rooms to an annex and welfare and service amenities.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the theatre took place on Oct. 17.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and Ri Thae Nam, An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, soldier-builders, officials of ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes in the fields of culture and arts and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a speech on the occasion.
					
					 He recalled that General Secretary Kim Jong Il wisely led the construction of the theatre, clearly indicating the orientation and ways for the building of the theatre and solving all problems arising in it from its designing to manpower for undertaking the project. 
					
					 He underlined the need for the officials, creators and artistes of the theatre to bring about a great surge in the art creation and performing activities in the same spirit as was displayed when reproducing light comedy "Echo of Mountain".
					
					 The participants went round the theatre.

articles.title: Gifts from Nepalese and Syrian Personages
articles.content:
Gifts from Nepalese and Syrian Personages
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by a member of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) who is the director of a hydro power generating company of Nepal and the president of the Commerce and Industry and Real Estate Investment Company at Latakia Province in Syria on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gifts were handed over to officials of the DPRK missions in those countries on Oct. 7 and 12.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola led by Jorge Inocenncio Dombolo, member of the Political Bureau and coordinator of the Discipline and Legal Affairs Committee of the Central Committee of the movement, and a delegation of the Ministry of Public Security of Viet Nam led by Deputy-Minister Bui Van Nam arrived here on Monday.
					Also arriving here was a delegation of People's Daily of China led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Ma Li on the same day.

articles.title: Many Minor Power Stations under Construction
articles.content:
Many Minor Power Stations under Construction
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Lots of minor hydropower stations,  along with large-scale power stations, have been built in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the wake of the completion of the Ryesonggang Power Station No. 6 and Yonsan Army-People Power Station projects for locally-run factories, more than ten minor power stations, including the Yonha Power Station and Unchonggang Power Station No. 3, are nearing completion. Several dozen minor power stations are now under construction across the country.
					
					 They are comparatively large in generating capacity. 
					
					 The Yonha Power Station, Chosan Youth Power Station No. 1 and some other minor power stations are equipped with a computer control system.
					
					 All provinces, cities and counties have pushed ahead with the construction of minor power stations, true to the slogan of the Workers' Party of Korea "Let Us Be Responsible for Thousand Years and Guarantee for Ten Thousand Years!"

articles.title: Spirulina Widely Used
articles.content:
Spirulina Widely Used
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Spirulina spores have been used in different sectors in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Spirulina contains many nutritive ingredients, including various sorts of mineral matters and vitamins.   
					
					 It is conducive to expanding the variety of foodstuffs and improving their quality.     
					
					 In recent years, remarkable successes have been made in the effort for establishing a production system of spirulina spores in foodstuff and stockbreeding industries.
					
					 The Paeksong Combined Foodstuff Factory in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, has applied spirulina to health drinks such as soda pop, soft drink and Eskimo Pie.
					
					 The Kubin Stockbreeding Cooperative Farm in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, has used spirulina as protein feed to increase livestock products.  
					
					 The farm, with the help of a scientific research institute, has built a facility for the production of liquefied spirulina spores and solved technological problems concerning the production.  
					
					 Many other foodstuff factories and stockbreeding farms throughout the country have made preparations to introduce liquefied spirulina spores in production.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Dodge Settlement of Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Dodge Settlement of Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- It is fortunate that the "Society for Asking about the State Responsibility for the Massacres of Koreans after the Great Quake in Kanto" was formed in Japan recently.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This clearly indicates that the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity can never be concealed and the Japanese government can never evade the responsibility for liquidating its past crimes no matter how much water may flow under the bridge. 
					
					 Germany honestly reflected on its past wrongs and has worked hard to fully redeem them. Quite contrary to this attitude of Germany, Japan has persistently evaded its responsibility and obligation to liquidate its past crimes, thus becoming the target of the world rebuff and condemnation.
					
					 The world is demanding Japan redeem its past crimes not merely out of the sympathy with the aging victims but is prompted by its desire to keep Japan from following the footsteps of the Japanese imperialists and the wish to build a world where such historic tragedy does not repeat itself.
					
					 Japan is persistently dodging the settlement of its past crimes in a bid to repeat its crime-woven past. This is evidenced by the fact that Japan is putting spurs to the moves to revive militarism and turn itself into a military power, obsessed by the ambition to realize the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 The persistent efforts on the part of Japan to go without redressing its past crimes would only touch off bitterer worldwide criticism of it and precipitate its thorough international isolation.
					
					 Japan's settlement of its past crimes is not something for others but for itself. It would be well advised to properly understand this and redress its past crimes as early as possible.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Reconciliation and Cooperation Called for
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Reconciliation and Cooperation Called for
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Unshakable are the desire and will of all the Koreans at home and abroad to put an end to the prevailing situation of the inter-Korean confrontation, a situation running counter to the June 15 era of reunification, and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity through national reconciliation and cooperation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 National reconciliation and cooperation are not only a prerequisite to the country's reunification but a unanimous desire of all the fellow countrymen as well as an urgent need of the times. 
					
					 There are neither reasons nor conditions for the north and the south of Korea to fail to achieve reconciliation and cooperation between them. Though they differ from each other in ideology and system they can surely get reconciled and cooperate with each other when they do things on the basis of the common points as a homogeneous nation which has created the same culture and history in the same territory since the time immemorial and the daily growing desire for reunification. 
					
					 Whoever loves the country and the nation and desires reunification should regard national reconciliation and cooperation as a common objective and orient and subordinate everything to achieving it. 
					
					 To this end, it is necessary, above all, to firmly preserve and sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					  Dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south should be developed into those for the country's reunification in the true sense of the word.
					
					 It is important to abolish all the legal and institutional mechanisms lying in the way of achieving national reunification through national reconciliation and cooperation. 
					
					 Any act of quelling the Koreans' desire for reunification in violation of the said declarations can neither be tolerated nor justified.

articles.title: Unpopular Rule in S. Korea Protested
articles.content:
Unpopular Rule in S. Korea Protested
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions and the Construction Trade Unions of south Korea made public a joint statement on October 15 to denounce the unpopular rule enforced by the south Korean puppet group.
					 The statement referred to the fact that a constructor in his 40s set himself on fire to death in protest against the entrepreneur side which failed to pay wages in arrears in Sunchang County of North Jolla Province on October 13. It deplored the present reality in which workers are forced to meet grievous deaths.
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 The "government" is apt to talk about "pro-common people" policy and "fair society". But, in fact, it has pressed for such policies for fattening big enterprises as the improvement project of four large rivers. 
					
					 The authorities should punish those responsible for the suicide and ensure workers the rights to labor and existence at an early date. 
					
					 If not, they would face strong anti-"government" struggle of workers across south Korea, the statement warned.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Approach Talks for Resumption of Tourism
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Approach Talks for Resumption of Tourism
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities whiled away time, talking about the "examination" of the DPRK's proposal for holding the working talks for the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and other issues on Oct. 15. When the proposed date was at hand, they said that they would "notify the stand of south Korea in the days ahead", thus putting off the talks. The authorities let loose poor excuse that they took into "consideration" the north-south Red Cross talks, the reunion of separated families and relatives, etc. slated to take place toward the end of this month.
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 The south Korean authorities put off the north-south working talks for the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang under the absurd pretext, a sleight of hand revealing their shallow trick.
					
					 The authorities will be left with no reason to while away time under the absurd pretext if they truly stand for the resumption of tour.
					
					 As for the north-south Red Cross talks and the scheduled reunion of separated families and relatives which they said took into "consideration", they were provided thanks to the initiative and sincere efforts made by the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations and have made progress under an agreement reached between the north and the south. Clear is an aim sought by the authorities when dragging on the working talks under the absurd pretext that can hardly convince anyone. That is to chill the mounting atmosphere of the improvement of the inter-Korean relations after whiling away time under the pretexts of "examination" and "consideration" and create another pretext for dodging the resumption of tourism and thus hamstring it for an indefinite period. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly wish for the improved inter-Korean relations, they should show their will for it by sincerely and positively approaching the dialogue and negotiations for the resumption of tourism, to begin with.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Celebrated
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Indonesia, Uganda and Iran, a lecture in Sweden and a film show in the Czech Republic on Oct. 5 and 6 in celebration of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Displayed in their venues were photos on the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the foundation and strengthening of the WPK and photos showing its 65-year-long history of victory and glory.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Arms of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that the reelection of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK at its Conference was an expression of the absolute trust and support of all the WPK members and other Korean people for him. We fully support and warmly welcome his reelection, he added.
					
					 The general secretary of the council stressed that the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the development of the WPK and the prosperity of the country would remain long in history.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said that the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il have been recognized not only by the Korean people but also by the whole world.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a lecture under the subject of "Founder of the WPK" that the WPK is now inspiringly arousing all the Party members and other people to the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation, pursuing the Songun politics on a full scale under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association Formed in Guinea
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association Formed in Guinea
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia association of Guinea was inaugurated with due ceremony in Conakry on Oct. 9.
					 Attending the ceremony were members of the organizing committee for the association. And present on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Conakry.
					
					 At the ceremony Aly Gilbert Iffono, minister of Decentralization and Local Development of Guinea, was elected honorary chairman of the association and Riyad Chaloub, secretary-general of the Ministry of  Information and Culture, its chairman.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The ceremony also decided on the orientation of the association's activity and its action program.

articles.title: DPRK's Reunification Proposal Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Reunification Proposal Supported
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, made public a statement on Oct. 10 to mark the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The statement said that the DFRK founding proposal is the most reasonable and just reunification proposal as it makes it possible to reunify Korea in an independent and peaceful way under the condition that differing ideas and systems exist in the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 It noted that the world progressives have expressed full support and solidarity with this proposal advanced by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People will as ever fully support the proposal, the statement said, hoping that Korea's reunification would be realized in a peaceful way at an early date.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Russia
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Russia
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the theme of "The Juche idea and its role in boosting Russia-DPRK friendship" was held in Saratov of Russia on Oct. 9 congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th birthday.
					 Present there were figures of the Saratov Regional Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Russia-Revolutionary Communist Party, the Saratov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy and the Russian Saratov Anti-Imperialist Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 A report was made by Kang Igor, chairman of the Russian Saratov Anti-Imperialist Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, at the seminar.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies' interference in the affairs of the sovereign states is adversely affecting the national development of those countries, he said, adding that in this context the experience gained by the DPRK in its nation-building is very important.
					
					 Barinov, vice-chairman of the Saratov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy, said in his speech titled "The philosophical principle of the Juche idea:" When witnessing the reality of the DPRK leading the struggle for global independence, while protecting its sovereignty and dignity from the imperialist allied forces single-handed I came to keenly realize that though the DPRK is not a big country in its territory it is a politico-ideological power to be reckoned with. 
					
					 A resolution adopted at the seminar said that it presented itself as an urgent issue for Russia at present to apply the Juche idea and the Songun politics. 
					
					 It underscored the need to boost the bilateral ties in every way for the common prosperity of the two countries.
					
					 Expressing full support and sympathy with the immortal Juche idea provided by President Kim Il Sung to progressive mankind, the resolution manifested the conviction that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people as long as they advance under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- One May day in Juche 61 (1972), President Kim Il Sung happened to see some children waving their hands towards the car carrying him on his way back from the field guidance to the Pyongyang Fruit Farm.
					 Their faces and clothes were covered all over with mud.
					
					 Looking out of the car window, he took on a serious look and told an official accompanying him that buttons came off the children's clothes and that one of them wore buttonless clothes.
					
					 He then said that they apparently lost buttons while playing tricks and that two or three suits of clothes would not be enough for mischievous boys, so families with many children would find it difficult to provide them with clothes.
					
					 Seeing the children in buttonless clothes, he was worried about their mothers' trouble and burden.
					
					 After several days the President convened a meeting of the Political Committee of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and had a decision on lowering the prices of children's garments and footwear adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recorre nuevo establecimiento de Restaurante Okryu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recorre nuevo establecimiento de Restaurante Okryu
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el recien construido  comedor de platos del Restaurante Okryu.
					  Este establecimiento deviene otro regalo al pueblo coreano, incluyendo a los capitalinos, preparado por el Dirigente quien esta pensando siempre en como mejorar la vida alimentaria de la poblacion.
					
					  Gracias a la construccion excelente del nuevo edificio con un area arquitectonica de mas de 6 mil metros cuadrados y una cabida para miles de clientes, la zona del Restaurante Okryu fue convertida en el orgulloso reparto de servicios gastronomicos donde se apinan las originales construcciones al estilo coreano.
					
					  El Dirigente recorrio durante largo tiempo el interior y el exterior del majestuoso y lujoso comedor, en que se combinan bien la belleza clasica nacional y la contemporanea, la elegancia y la fineza, averiguando en detalles el estado de construccion.
					
					  Al cerciorarse de las condiciones del comedor como su forma y contenido e instalaciones de cocina y muebles de las salas de comer, se puso muy contento de que los constructores militares lo hayan construido en el maximo nivel conforme a la estetica del nuevo siglo manifestando plenamente el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  Diciendo que el nuevo comedor con buena estructura interna es una perfecta base de servicios tanto en su contenido como en su forma y su obra ha sido ejecutada en el alto nivel, aprecio mucho los meritos de los constructores militares, que hicieron muchos favores para el pueblo, y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					  Resulta un milagro realmente sorprendente la construccion en medio ano de este moderno comedor que no tendra defectos ni en el remoto futuro, apunto y continuo que este exito maravilloso deviene la demostracion clara del inagotable poderio espiritual de los uniformados coreanos, creadores del espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  Se mostro muy alegre de que el Restaurante Okryu, famoso centro de servicio al pueblo, construido hace mucho tiempo a la ribera del pintoresco rio Taedong como obra maestra de Corea, se haya hecho otro valioso patrimonio de la nacion coreana y restaurante de talla mundial al construirse el nuevo comedor de primera categoria.
					
					  Ahora, en todas partes del pais se construyen una tras otra las creaciones monumentales y se incrementan incesantemente los bienes eternos de la patria y por fin, nuestro pueblo podra vivir feliz al cabo de muchas pruebas, senalo y agrego que gracias al inagotable poderio espiritual de nuestro heroico pueblo, que supero con valentia todas las pruebas y dificultades, se va poniendo a la vista el maravilloso perfil de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  El Restaurante Okryu es el producto de gran amor por el pueblo del Presidente Kim Il Sung, que encarna su ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como cielo), dijo y continuo que transmitir de generacion en generacion este precioso patrimonio legado por el Presidente deviene el sagrado deber y sublime obligacion moral de nuestro pueblo.
					
					  Este restaurante ocupa una posicion importante en mejorar la vida alimentaria del pueblo y poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del regimen socialista de Corea, subrayo y presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la administracion del comedor.
					
					  El PTC tiene el proposito e ideal de llevar al plano supremo la vida y cultura culinarias del pueblo coreano que vivira en la gran potencia prospera, senalo y enfatizo que el nuevo comedor debe cumplir el papel central en el desarrollo culinario del pais.
					
					  Subrayo que este comedor debe hacer y servir no solo los platos nacionales sino tambien los especiales hechos con la tortuga de agua dulce, el salmon, el esturion, la codorniz y la rana toro.
					
					  Asevero que si este comedor sirve las cocinas nacionales y las famosas del mundo bien preparadas, el Restaurante Okryu sera mas visitado y se divulgaran desde aqui a todo el pais los platos famosos.
					
					  A fin de garantizar la eficiencia del comedor, es preciso elevar incesantemente el nivel tecnico de los cocineros y suministrar suficientemente las materias primas y materiales, dijo y anadio que al mismo tiempo, hay que asegurar las condiciones higienicas del comedor y prestar profunda atencion al cuidado de equipos.
					
					   Ese dia, el Dirigente probo junto con los cuadros acompanantes el fideo en caldo frio de Pyongyang, preparado por los empleados del Restaurante Okryu, y senalo que ellos lo han hecho manteniendo bien el sabor propio de ese plato y la tradicion de su preparacion.
					
					  Finalmente, expreso la esperanza de que el Restaurante Okryu cumplira con fidelidad su mision como organo de servicios gastronomicos adorado por el pueblo.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC.

articles.title: MINREX aboga por ejecutar la declaracion del 19 de septiembre
articles.content:
MINREX aboga por ejecutar la declaracion del 19 de septiembre
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con la visita a China de la delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz de la cancilleria respondio el dia 16 como sigue.
					  A invitacion del Ministerio de RR.EE. de la Republica Popular China, la delegacion encabezada por el primer vicecanciller Kim Kye Gwan realizo desde el dia 12 al 16 una visita a China y discutio sincera y francamente los problemas sobre las relaciones Corea-China, la reanudacion de las conversaciones a las 6 bandas, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y regiones, etc.
					
					  Estamos listos a la reanudacion de dichas conversaciones, pero, Estados Unidos y otros ciertos paises participantes en esta cita no se ven preparados. En tales condiciones, decidimos continuar esforzarnos con paciencia sin apresurarnos.
					
					  Es invariable la voluntad de la RPDC tendente a  realizar las conversaciones a las 6 bandas y la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de septiembre para la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Depositadas ofrendas florales ante la tumba de Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Depositadas ofrendas florales ante la tumba de Ri Po Ik
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 51o aniversario del fallecimiento de la ferviente patriota Ri Po Ik, tuvo lugar este lunes una ceremonia de homenaje ante su tumba en Mangyongdae.
					  En el lugar estaba colocada la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  En la ocasion participaron Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Ju Sang Song, Hong Sok Hyong y Ri Thae Nam, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, los ministerios y las instituciones centrales, los funcionarios y trabajadores de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  Fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del CC del PTC, los ministerios, las instituciones centrales, las escuelas revolucionarias, los organos del partido y el Poder y las granjas de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de la patriota quien en el periodo de martirios nacionales empujo a sus familiares a la lucha por rescatar el pais y dedico todo lo suyo a la sagrada causa por la patria y el pueblo.

articles.title: Inaugurada VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal
articles.content:
Inaugurada VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal 
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 18 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang.
					En la ocasion fueron presentados las maquinas herramientas, equipos electricos y electronicos, vehiculos, medicamentos, articulos de uso diario, alimentos, etc. de las companias de Corea, China, Cuba, Alemania, Rusia, Malasia, Mongolia, Siria, Suiza, Singapur, Australia, Austria, Italia, Indonesia, la India, Polonia y Taipei China.
					
					En el acto participaron el viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Ri Thae Nam, el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, y otros funcionarios coreanos, las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises y regiones, los representantes diplomaticos y otros miembros de las embajadas de varios paises acreditados en Corea.
					
					Despues del discurso de felicitacion del viceministro de Comercio Exterior, O Ryong Chol, pronuncio la palabra inaugural el director de la Agencia de Exposicion Internacional de Corea, Kim Mun Jong.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tiene la invariable politica de desarrollar en el principio de igualdad y beneficio mutuo las relaciones economicas y comerciales con todos los paises que la traten de manera amistosa.
					
					Esta feria de Pyongyang cumple un gran rol en mejorar las condiciones de negocios economicos y del intercambio de ciencias y tecnicas avanzadas y en asegurar la cooperacion economica, subrayaron y enfatizaron que Corea desarrollara con mas amplitud las relaciones de cooperacion economica con otros paises.
					
					Este dia, se ofrecio en el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang un banquete con motivo de la apertura de la feria.
					
					La exposicion se efectuara hasta el dia 21.
